description:
This command allows to see which deposits were created for the user, executing the command, or its subuser.
Please note that a negative deposit amount relates to a credit while a positive amount relates to a deposit being substracted from the user's credit.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Subuser account ID; if omitted, then the deposits, assigned to the user, executing the command, are being returned
Depth of the response list, may be only SELF here; it is also the default value
The type of deposit, for example PAYMENT or COM_BACKORDER
